import React from 'react' import emailjs from 'emailjs-com' const Newsletter: React.FunctionComponent = () => { function sendEmail(e: any): any { e.preventDefault() emailjs.sendForm('service_edicoffee', 'template_x46po15', e.target, 'user_22xKKTcPPK13VvltlBeLw').then( (result) => { console.log(result.text) }, (error) => { console.log(error.text) } ) } return (

Join Our Newsletter

Latest news, articles and updates monthly delivered to your inbox.

) } export default Newsletter
